section.name: 5. Servlet Filter
section.p: WebApplicationContextFilter is a contribution by Gary Jarrel to provide functionality similar to WebApplicationContextProvider (i.e. automatic binding of session DataContext to a thread) via a different servlet container hook - a filter - that is compatible with Servlet specification 2.3. Read WebApplicationContextFilter JavaDocs for usage instructions in a web application.
WebApplicationContextFilter will be included in the core Cayenne in the future release.
